Nice City and Countryside Tours, Easter day, 20 April 2003

---Driving between Gourdon and Tourrettes sur Loup---
---More countryside---
---Waterfalls were abundant as snow was melting---

---Arriving at Tourrettes sur Loup, the Violet City where violets are grown in the hills for the perfume industry.---
---A medieval village perched on a rocky hill---
---Enter the house from a road on the ground floor and exit on an upper floor onto another road.---

--- Driving back to Nice---
---The Mediterranean Sea in Nice---
---Clearly the name Cote d'Azur is appropriate. Look at those colors!---
